name: Hacker & Spy
description:
2 player asymmetric game about a heist. 

To play, have one person open up the game called "Hacker Half" and another person open up the game called "Spy Half".  Both players should be in the same room and communicate with each other verbally, but are not allowed to show each other their screens or communicate visually (draw pictures, hand motions, etc).

This game was very inspired by Keep Talking and Nobody Explodes

This game was made for a class project using:

GB Studio

Twine

Glyph Generator
